thing-type.label: Hue Presence Sensor
thing-type.description: A motion sensor providing presence detection

parameter.name: lightId
parameter.label: Sensor ID
parameter.description: The identifier that is used within the hue bridge.

parameter.name: on
parameter.label: On
parameter.description: Indicates whether the sensor is on

parameter.name: battery
parameter.label: Battery level
parameter.description: The battery level of the sensor

parameter.name: reachable
parameter.label: Reachable
parameter.description: Indicates whether the sensor is reachable

parameter.name: sensitivity
parameter.label: Sensitivity
parameter.description: The current sensitivity of the presence sensor. Cannot exceed maximum sensitivity

parameter.name: sensitivitymax
parameter.label: Maximum Sensitivity
parameter.description: The maximum sensitivity of the presence sensor
